resources.string: Select tasks and settings to import
Some selected tasks to restore have the same name as the currently existing tasks. Overwrite the following tasks with imported tasks?
The following synchronization tasks have been imported as a test mode. We strongly recommend you to test them to make sure that there are no unintentional file deletions or file overwrites.
Failed to import, check the Message tab for errors.
Delete all existing tasks before import
The specified file is not a synchronous task list save file. File=%s
An error occurred while importing the task list. Please check the error in the message tab.
Import task list and app settings
An attempt to auto-save the synchronization settings has failed

The account name, account password or ZIP password used in the following tasks failed to import. If you auto-save the sync task and then reinstall the app, you will not be able to decrypt your account name, account password, and ZIP password. Edit the sync task and retype the user login settings.
Protect backup file with a password
Enter password for the settings backup file.

If you proceed, the following data will be recorded in the log file:\nAndroid version, Device name, Directory name, File name, SMB Account name, IP address, Network interface name, System settings, App information

Send log file by E-Mail to the developer. The log file contains Android version, Device name, Directory name, File name, SMB Account name, IP address, Network interface name, System settings and App information.
1.Press the Preview button to check the conents of the temp_log.txt file that will be sent (if the selection screen of the application is displayed, then select the FAVORIT application to display the text file.)
 2.Once you have confirmed what you are submitting, press the "Send" button to describe your question or problem.
 3.If you want to password protect the ZIP file, enter the password and confirmation password.
 4.Press the Send button and select E-Mail in the E-Mail Selection dialog.
 5.Please send the e-mail.
 6.If you password-protected the ZIP file, tap the Send ZIP File Password button to send it by e-mail.
If you forget your password please initialize or reinstall the application.
If you forget your password, you will need to initialize or reinstall the application. Continue ?

The application password cannot be decrypted because the key stored in the Android Keystore has been changed after the application password was created.
Please follow the following steps to recover it.
1. Save your task list if possible.
2.Reinstall SMBSync3(Uninstall and Install)
3. Importing a saved task list(or import an auto-saved task list)
Internal key verification code save error
Specify remote server name or IP address.
Specify port number of remote server.
Local directory name contains the %s character. Invalid character removed.
The requested operation was ignored during synchronization.
Failed to create settings backup file: %s
The task name should not exceed %s characters in length
When a task is renamed, the task name in the schedule/group is also changed.
When the task is deleted, the task name in the schedule/group is also deleted.
The task name contains invalid characters: \"%s\"
Sync canceled: received request from external app is not a string
Generation of remote file list cancelled.
An error occurred while creating the SMB file list.
The content has been changed, do you want to cancel without saving?
The filter is not allowed to start or end with \"/\". Please remove the \"/\". Filter=%s
The \"/*\" at the end is invalid. \"/*\" should be removed. Filter=%s
For filters that begin with \"\\\", \"*/\" is invalid." Please remove \"*/\". Filter=%s
You cannot use the \"*\" only filter. Please specify like \"*abc\" etc.
You can\'t use a filter with a series of \"*\" like \"**\". Please specify like \"*a*\".
You cannot use spaces before and after the\"*\".
You cannot use \"\\\" except for the first character. Please remove the \"\\\" except for the first letter. Filter=%s
Changed the filter to exclude it from being selected because it contains a \"\\".\nFilter=%s
Please fill in the details of your problem or question about SMBSync3.
Example: The sdcard is not recognized by SMBSync3.
The problem/question is not described, we cannot answer it unless the problem/question of SMBSync3 is described.
Do you want to start the following tasks?
Disable this notification (can be enabled in sync settings)
New external storage has been detected. Add external storage?
Disable this notification (can be enabled in sync settings)
Failed to launch activity to write permission to external storage.
You cannot perform any tasks using external storage until you are granted access to the external storage.
The root directory of the storage was not selected. Do you want to reselect?
The following UUIDs cannot be used because they are duplicated. Format a MicroSD or USB OTG drive to use it.
The application cannot be started because you have not been granted permission to access the storage.
Grant permission to access storage to read and write data that is synchronized to storage and for administrative data.
Execute all tasks configured to auto sync.
No sync tasks available for execution. Please create a sync task.
Do you want to delete all history?
Do you want to delete the following history items?
History log file could not be found.
You will not be able to see the details because there is no application to display the text file.
Sync task has not been executed.
Duplicate directory names exist at both internal storage source and destination. Source and destination directory names must be different.
Duplicate directory names exist at both source and destination. Source and destination directory names must be different.
Duplicate directory names exist at both external storage source and destination. Source and destination directory names must be different.
Source and destination SMB folders are identical. You must select different source and destination directory names.
Specify the IP address or host name of the SMB server.
Specify the port number of the SMB server.
Specify the name of the SMB share.
Specify the SMB Host account name and password or password only.
Write to external storage is not allowed, edit the source folder and allow writing to external storage.
Write to external storage is not allowed, edit the destination folder and allow writing to external storage.
Access to the storage is not allowed, please press the “Allow use external storage” button to allow access to the storage.
No destination directory specified for this task. Unpredictable deletes or overwrites may occur. Continue?
Start sync only in specified Wifi condition
Registered in the IP address list
The specified sync task will not be executed because it was ignored.
Selected task is configured for test only. No files will be copied or deleted. Execute the task?
Press add button to create new sync task.
Do you want the following tasks to be \"auto task\"?
Do you want the following tasks to be \"manual\"?
If source or destination are located on SMB server: set Start sync only in specified Wifi condition to \"Conn any AP\"?
If source or destination are located on SMB server: set Start sync only in specified Wifi condition to \"Has private address\"?
When SMB is set as the source folder, you cannot select ZIP as the destination folder. Therefore, the destination folder has been changed to local.
Find and configure the SMB server
Authorize the account or specify the correct account name and press the \"Refresh share list\" button.
An account name that cannot log in is specified. Specify the correct account name and click the \"Refresh share list\" button.
The account name or password is incorrect. Specify the correct account name and password and click the \"Refresh share list\" button.
The account name or password is not specified. Specify the correct account name and password and click the \"Refresh share list\" button.
The current SMB protocol does not allow you to connect to the SMB server, please change the SMB protocol.
The SMB account or password in the source folder is blank because it cannot be decrypted. Please edit the source folder and correct the SMB account or password.
The SMB account or password in the destination folder is blank because it cannot be decrypted. Please edit the destination folder and correct the SMB account or password.
The ZIP password for the destination folder is blank because it cannot be decrypted. Edit the destination folder and change the password to the correct one.
Append time stamp to ZIP file name
The sync task settings have changed. Exit without saving?

Reversing the direction of synchronization may result in unexpected deletes of files and directories.\nIt is strongly recommend that you enable Test mode and ensure that no files or directories are removed or replaced unintentionally.
In the source folder, variables related to the date and time of the shooting are not available and have been removed.
Invalid characters have been removed from the specified directory name (\", :, \\, ?, *, <, >, \|)
File name filter has not been specified
Invalid characters have been removed from the specified file name (/, \", :, \\, ?, *, <, >, \|)
The share name contained characters that could not be used, so they have been removed. (\" / \\ [ ] : | <, >, + = ; , ? *)
Removed the extra separator \"/\" in the directory name.
Wireless LAN IP address not specified.
Wireless LAN is not connected to the specified access point.
Do you want to add the following to the file filter?
Sync files if their size is:
Ignore files with a file size of 0 Bytes
File size cannot be more than 5 digits
The file size must be greater than or equal to 1
Include files if modification date is:
On sync start day or later
The update date is not specified.
Please specify at least one day as the update date.
The update date cannot be more than 3 digits.
Min allowed time difference (in seconds) between source and destination files
Allow sync with all IP addresses (include public)
Delete files prior to sync (Mirror mode only)
Size only compare (files are considered different only if size of the source is larger than the destination)
Use file size to determine if files are different
Use time of last modification to determine if files are different
Removes directories and files excluded by the filter

Warning: all files and folders that do not exist in the Source directory and those that are not included by the defined filters will be deleted from the Target directory !\nStrongly recommend that you test and make sure that no unintended files or directories are removed.
Removes directories and files excluded by the filter
File sync skipped because \"Do not overwrite destination file if it is newer than source file\" option is enabled.
Skip directory and file names that contain invalid characters (\", :, \\, ?, *, <, >, \|)
Sync includes the files located directly in root of the source directory
Do not overwrite destination file if it is newer than source file

WARNING: Possible Unexpected Results !\nIf you live in a zone with DST or if you switch TimeZones, destination file can wrongly show an older time than the source if it was modified within the DST/TimeZone interval change. It is strongly recommended to enable \"Confirm before overwrite/delete\" option. Please verify the contents of the file before overwiting it.
\"Use file size to determine if files are different\" and \"Use time of last modification to determine if files are different\" are both not selected and will always overwrite the destination file.
Ignore Day Light Saving Time difference between files
Time difference between daylight saving time and standard time (minutes)
Do not set last modified time of destination file to match source file

When enabled, the last modified time of the destination file cannot be the same as the source file, so the file is copied each time it is synchronized. Use this option when the destination cannot set the last modified time, for example.\nIf this option is enabled, you can prevent files from being copied each time by disabling \"Use time of last modification to determine if files are different\".
Start subsequent tasks even if they don\'t fit the network options
Ignore all errors and start subsequent tasks

If this option is set to \"Stop\", even if a synchronous task is terminated with an error, a subsequent task will still be executed. Disable this only if you want to make sure that the next task is executed.
Execute sync tasks only when charging
Test mode (do not copy or delete files)
Delete the source directory when it is empty (only when Sync option is Move)
Limit SMB I/O write buffer to 16 KB
If the date and time cannot be determined by EXIF data, a confirmation message is displayed
Ignore source files that are larger than 4 GB when sync to external storage
Ignore files whose file names exceed 255 bytes
Save all files in the destination directory without creating subdirectories
Keep a two-way sync conflict file
The parameters have been changed. Do you want to exit?
A variable related to the date and time of the shot is used in the destination folder.(%s) It cannot be used by the mirror and must be removed.
Failed to save the sync settings file: %s
Could not get the list of SMB shares. Please check:\n- the shares configuration on the SMB server side\n- the proper user-name/password needed by the server is provided
Application was restarted after being killed. To disable restart, enable \"Don\'t keep activities\" in Settings > Developer Options.
Application was restarted because it was killed when it moved to the background.
The settings of SMBv1 have been changed. This change will not be effective until the application is restarted. Exit this application now?
It is recommended to restart the application after changing the theme or language. Click \"Restart\" to restart now. If you want to restart it later, click \"Later\"
Please specify a name for the task
I agree to the privacy policy
If you do not agree to the privacy policy, you will not be able to start the application.
Performing maintenance of app data files
Confirm cancel maintenance of app data files?
Maintenance of application data files.\nNo sync tasks can be executed while maintenance of app data files is running. Run the maintenance operation?
Unable to perform maintenance of app data files while sync task is running.
Maintenance of app data files has been cancelled.
%s items deleted from the list of last modified files.
Maintenance of app data files is complete.
Maintenance of app data files has started.
%s history log files have been deleted.
Files and directories not related to history logs have been found in the history log directory. Remove these files?

The image capture time and date cannot be obtained from EXIF data. Use file update time and date instead? (Disable the \"Confirm\" archiving option for this sync task to avoid this message in the future)
Confirm overwrite of file \n%s\n(Disable the \"Confirm before overwrite/delete\" option for this sync task to avoid this message in the future)
Confirm delete directory \n%s\n(Disable the \"Confirm before overwrite/delete\" option for this sync task to avoid this message in the future)
Confirm deletion of file \n%s\n(Disable the \"Confirm before overwrite/delete\" option for this sync task to avoid this message in the future)
Do you want to delete the files in the ZIP file?\n%s\n(Disable the \"Confirm before overwrite/delete\" option for this sync task to avoid this message in the future)
Do you want to delete the directories in the ZIP file?\n%s\n(Disable the \"Confirm before overwrite/delete\" option for this sync task to avoid this message in the future)

Confirm moving of file
Move from: %1$s 
Destination: %2$s 
(If you don't need to confirm, uncheck "Confirm" in the synchronization task.)
Tap here to confirm file archiving.
Tap here to confirm file overwrite.
Tap here to confirm directory delete.
Tap here to confirm file delete.
Tap here to confirm file move.
The last modified time of the file was used because the shooting date and time cannot be obtained from the EXIF/metadata of the file. File=
The last modified time of the file was used because an error occurred in the conversion of the shooting date. File=
Sync aborted because the destination path contains a directory with the same name as the file being copied. File=
Synchronization was cancelled because the length of the file name exceeds 255 characters. File name chars=%1$s, File name=%2$s
The file was ignored because the length of the file name exceeds 255 bytes. File name in bytes =%1$s, file name=%2$s
Sync cancelled because external storage is not mounted.
Sync cancelled because storage can not be access. UUID=%s
Ignored it because the file size is over 4GB. File=%s
The directory is ignored because the directory is inaccessible. Directory=%s
The file was ignored because the file was inaccessible. File=%s
Subdirectories were ignored because \"Include subdirectories\" was disabled. Directory=%s
setLastModified() failed. Enable \"Do not set last modified time of destination file to match source file\" in sync task options.
File copy ignored because the \"Overwrite destination file(s)\" option is disabled for this task.
File move ignored because the \"Overwrite destination file(s)\" option is disabled for this task.
Invalid folder type combination. Source=%1$s, Destination=%2$s
The source file or directory name contains invalid characters for the destination. Edit name to allow sync. Character: %1$s, Path: %2$s
File or directory excluded from sync process because source name contains characters not valid for the destination. Character: %1$s, Path: %2$s
Unable to connect to SMB host=%s
Unable to connect to SMB host %1$s on port %2$s
The SMB host name could not be found. Try to use its IP address. Host Name=%s
Directory ignored because destination and source are the same. Directory=%s
The file was ignored because the same file could not be synchronized in the source and destination. File=%s
Unable to connect to the specified SMB server. Server=%s
Unable to connect to the specified SMB server. IP address=%1$s, port=%2$s
The specified SMB server host name could not be found. Host name=%s
Sync aborted. Wireless adapter does not have the specified IP address.
Sync aborted. Not connected to the specified wireless access point.
Sync aborted. Not connected to a WiFi access point.
Sync aborted. Network address is not a private IP.
Sync aborted. Wireless LAN is off.
Sync aborted. Network address cannot be obtained.
Sync aborted because network address is not a private address (%s). Please enable the all IP address in the Synchronization Options when you want to perform synchronization.
Sync request has been started. Requestor=%s
Sync task skipped because wireless LAN address does not match the specified IP address.
Sync task skipped because wireless LAN is not connected to the specified WiFi access point.
Wireless LAN was turned on to start the planned tasks. The synchronization is set to start after %s seconds...
The file could not be deleted. File=%s
Could not move the file (source file cannot be deleted). File=%s
Source file or directory not found. File=%s
# of copies=%1$s, # of moves=%2$s, # of replaced=%3$s, # of deletes=%4$s, # of ignores=%5$s, Elapsed time=%6$s
The error was ignored due to the setting of the error handling option.
# of copies=%1$s, # of deletes=%2$s, # of ignores=%3$s, # of warnings=%4$s, # of retries=%5$s, # of errors=%6$s
Specify IP address range, then press the Search button
Select host name or IP address from search results
The end address should be larger than the start address.
Unable to search other than private addresses.
Search is not possible because WiFi is off. Please turn on WiFi to search for your SMB server.
If Wi-Fi is off, enable it to start the scheduled tasks
After Wi-fi is turned on, delay sync by:
Turn off back the Wifi once the scheduled tasks are completed.
Reset interval startup time to last sync event.
Sync on the last day of every month

If the selected day never occurs in some months, sync will be skipped on those months. Exp: you select 29 and February has only 28 days, or you select 31 and the month only has 30 days. Select \"Sync on the last day of the month\" option to ensure the task is executed on the last day of every month.
Please specify the sync tasks to be scheduled by pressing the ‘Sync list...’ button below.
The task specified in the schedule cannot be found.\nSchedule: %1$s, Task: %2$s
Specified sync task name was not found, Name= (%s)
Sync task was already deleted or renamed.
Please select at least one day of the week.
This sync task name already exists. Use a different name.
Task schedule name is not specified.
Do you want to delete the following item(s)? The results are immediately reflected and cannot be undone.
Do you want to enable the following item(s)? The results are immediately reflected and cannot be undone.
Do you want to disable the following item(s)? The results are immediately reflected and cannot be undone.
Change the schedule name? The results are immediately reflected and cannot be undone.
The schedule has changed. Exit without saving?
renameSchedule error, schedule item can not be found.
Press add button to create new schedule.
Scheduled sync was not performed because the schedule is disabled. To enable a scheduled sync, tap the toggle switch in front of the scheduled item.
Do you want to enable the schedule?
Do you want to disable the schedule?
Toggle Enable or Disable the schedule.
Schedules and WiFi options for multiple tasks will be consolidated to prevent duplicate sync processes.
Would you like to delete the following tasks?
Would you like to enabled the following tasks?
Would you like to disabled the following tasks?
Auto task does not exists. Group=%1$s
Task does not exists. Group=%1$s, Task=%2$s
No tasks exist that can be added.
Press the Task List button to specify the tasks to be synchronized.
A synchronization task has been deleted or renamed. Task=%s
No synchronization task has been specified
This group name already exists. Use a different name.
Task group name is not specified.
Could not find the task specified in the group. Task=(%s)
You can change the order of the items by moving up and down by pressing and holding the items.
Do you want to delete the following item(s)? The results are immediately reflected and cannot be undone.
Do you want to enable the following item(s)? The results are immediately reflected and cannot be undone.

Click the Add button to create a group.

Do you want to disable the group?

Disable this notification (can be enabled in sync settings)
(%s) Do you want to start \"Auto task\"?
(%s) Do you want to start the following tasks?
(%s) Ignored the start sync request because it has already been sync started.
Because sync task is disabled, it was not possible to start it.
Sync request received from the SMBSync3 scheduler.
Sync request received from the SMBSync3 scheduler, but it was ignored because this task does not exist:
Execution aborted because the sync task does not exist.
Sync request received from an external application.
Sync request received from an external application, but it was ignored because the specified sync task does not exist:
Sync request received from an external application, but it was ignored because the specified sync group does not exist. Group=%s
Execution aborted because the sync task does not exist.
Execution aborted because no sync task has been specified.
Automatic sync task has been started because no sync task was specified.
Sync request received from a shortcut.
Sync request ignored because it has already been processed. ID=%s
Sync task was ignored because it was in error state. Task=%1$s, Requestor=%2$s
Sync task was ignored because it was already queued. Task=%1$s, Requestor=%2$s
Sync task was ignored because it was already queued. Schedule=%1$s, Task=%2$s, Requestor=%3$s

Start sync task request accepted. Schedule=%1$s, Task=%2$s, Requestor=%3$s
The following sync request was ignored because the previous sync ended with errors or was cancelled.
Archive for the following file extensions:
The buttons below add parameters related to the taken date and time.
The button below adds a parameters for the sync start date and time.
The button below adds a parameters for the file name
The button below adds a character.
Use taken date and time for parameter conversion below
Change the name of the file before archiving it in the destination folder.
Create a directory based on the archiving date to store the files.
ZIP files cannot be used as destinations for Archive sync type. Internal storage will be used instead.
The request was ignored because Zip files cannot be used as destinations for Archive sync type.
Select the storage for which you want permission.
There was no storage requiring permissions.
Storage Grant write permission failed because null intent data was returned.

SMBSync 3 requires "All File Access" permission to synchronize to the various directories you specify.
Please follow the steps below to allow "All File Access" to access the storage.

 0.Click the "Next" button at the bottom of the screen.
 1.Tap "SMBSync3" on the "All File Access" permissions screen that appears.
 2.Tap the switch on the right side of the screen.
 3.Make sure that the switch on the right side of the screen turns blue.
 4. Return to the application screen with the back key
You cannot launch the app until \"All File Access\" is allowed. If you want to allow it, please start the app again.
The \"All File Access\" permission screen could not be displayed.\nError=%s
Application password has not been created yet.
Do you want to remove App password?
Prompt for password on application start
Prompt for password when editing a task
Prompt for password when exporting sync settings
Re-enter the account name and password in the Edit SMB folder.
Require user to reauthenticate after 30 minutes
Re-enter the password when editing a ZIP folder.
Do not display the \"Show Password\" button on the Edit SMB folder screen
Do not display the \"Show Password\" button on the Edit ZIP folder screen
Always display the multi-pane view in landscape orientation even on a low density screen
If the application process is killed, exit cleanly
Wake up device and keep display on when sync starts (enable if sync doesn\'t start or complete during sleep)
Do Not Compress These File Types
